DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine untrained person diabetes without diabetes could operate Investigational Blood Glucose Monitoring System ( BGMS ) obtain valid blood glucose result .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Karajishi Contour Investigational Blood Glucose Monitoring System ( ISO/FDA Study )
DOC.criteria: Males female , 18 year age old Able speak , read , understand English Willing complete study procedure Hemophilia bleed disorder Pregnancy Physical , visual , neurological impairment would make person unable perform test BGM Previously participate BG monitor study use Karajishi Contour BGMS ( use Bayer Contour meter ) Work medical laboratory , hospital , clinical set involve train clinical use blood glucose monitor Work competitive medical device company , immediate family member work company A condition , opinion investigator designee , would put person study conduct risk General enrollment guideline : Most subject person type 1 type 2 diabetes At least 10 % subject diabetes type 1 diabetes Approximately 10 % subject person without diabetes At least 60 % subject young age 65
